pageContext.claim: “Yet for those under age 50, the recovery rate is 99.98%. Think of that. 99.98.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's minimization of the risk of dying from covid-19 for much of the population ignores the fact that tens of thousands of people who came down with covid-19 have lingering effects that can last for months. They are known as "long-haulers" and the still-mysterious condition affects every age group. A small number of Covid patients who had never experienced mental health problems also are developing severe psychotic symptoms weeks after contracting the coronavirus. And researchers from Ohio State University found that out of more than two dozen athletes from the university who tested positive for covid-19, 30% had cellular heart damage and 15% showed signs of heart inflammation caused by a condition known as myocarditis.
